Detailed Description

cvmx_bgx::_spu::_br_algn_status

This register implements the Std 802.3 multilane BASE-R PCS alignment status 1-4 registers (3.50-3.53). It is valid only when the LPCS type is 40GBASE-R (BGX()_CMR()_CONFIG[LMAC_TYPE] = 0x4), and always returns 0x0 for all other LPCS types. Std 802.3 bits that are not applicable to 40GBASE-R (e.g. status bits for PCS lanes 19-4) are not implemented and marked as reserved. PCS lanes 3-0 are valid and are mapped to physical SerDes lanes based on the programming of BGX()_CMR()_CONFIG[LANE_TO_SDS].
